Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) have been gaining increased attention in the energy sector.
Titulo: Effective buffer layer thickness of La-doped CeO2 for high durability and performance on La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O3-δ electrolyte supported type solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Commonly, yttria-stabilized zirconia is widely employed as commercial electrolyte, however, resulted in drawbacks such as high-temperature operating and low conductivity which negatively affect the durability and efficiency.
Titulo: Effective buffer layer thickness of La-doped CeO2 for high durability and performance on La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O3-δ electrolyte supported type solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Thus there are many efforts to find high-ionic conductors.
Titulo: Effective buffer layer thickness of La-doped CeO2 for high durability and performance on La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O3-δ electrolyte supported type solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: From the point of manufacturing, the major difficulty of LaGaO3-based electrolyte as a high-ionic conductor is its incompatibility with commercial Ni-based anodes during high-temperature processes as well as operating.
Titulo: Effective buffer layer thickness of La-doped CeO2 for high durability and performance on La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O3-δ electrolyte supported type solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Several interlayers have been introduced to prevent the reaction between LaGaO3-based electrolyte and Ni-based anode.
Titulo: Effective buffer layer thickness of La-doped CeO2 for high durability and performance on La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O3-δ electrolyte supported type solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In this study, we investigate the optimal thickness of the La-doped CeO2 (LDC) interlayer by the screen-printing method using La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O3-delta for the commercial electrolyte supported SOFCs.
Titulo: Effective buffer layer thickness of La-doped CeO2 for high durability and performance on La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O3-δ electrolyte supported type solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: As a result, the superior power performance of 2.2 W.cm(-2) at 1123 K is achieved through the optimized LDC thickness of 20 mu m through not lab-scaled but commercial ceramic manufacturing processing.
Titulo: Effective buffer layer thickness of La-doped CeO2 for high durability and performance on La0.9Sr0.1Ga0.8Mg0.2O3-δ electrolyte supported type solid oxide fuel cells
